name: Danielle Roy
text: Flat tire on a Ferrari at 10pm Saturday night on our way back to Montreal. Canadian Towing came to the rescue! Great services and amazing staffs, highly recommend for any high-end vehicle transport.

name: Luc Tremblay
text: Fastest response time in Nepean. My truck's battery died in the middle of a snowstorm and they were there in 20 minutes. Professional jump start service.

name: Sarah Jenkins
text: Excellent roadside assistance. I was locked out of my car at the mall and the technician was very careful not to scratch the window trim. Very impressed.

name: Marc-Andre L.
text: Reliable long-distance towing. Had to move my classic car from Ottawa to Kanata. They used a modern flatbed and secured it perfectly. Best in the city.
